SELECT DISTINCT a.paper_id paperId, a.paper_name paperName, a.subject_id ,b.subject_name subjectName ,a.difficulty ,a.class_id classId , c.class_name className ,a.paper_date paperDate ,a.exam_date examDate , a.paper_score paperScore ,a.teach_name teachName ,a.create_time createTime,d.status ,d.fraction,d.user_id FROM zj_paper_info a LEFT JOIN zj_subject_info b ON a.subject_id = b.subject_id LEFT JOIN zj_class_info c ON a.class_id = c.class_id LEFT JOIN zj_paper_user d ON a.paper_id = d.paper_id
order by a.create_time desc

SELECT a.paper_id paperId, b.title_id titleId,b.title_name titleName, b.title_answer titleAnswer, b.title_fraction fraction, b.title_status titleStatus,b.choice1 ,b.choice2,b.choice3 ,b.choice4 FROM zj_subject_user_link a LEFT JOIN zj_title_info b ON a.title_id = b.title_id where a.paper_id = #{paperId}

SELECT a.paper_id paperId, a.paper_name paperName, a.subject_id ,b.subject_name subjectName ,a.difficulty ,a.class_id classId , c.class_name className ,a.paper_date paperDate ,a.exam_date examDate , a.paper_score paperScore ,a.teach_name teachName ,a.create_time createTime FROM zj_paper_info a LEFT JOIN zj_subject_info b ON a.subject_id = b.subject_id LEFT JOIN zj_class_info c ON a.class_id = c.class_id order by a.create_time desc
